"""
Wellness retreat participant requests HDMI cable for mindfulness and meditation sessions; discuss wellness amenities and therapeutic technology.

ROLES: user (wellness retreat participant), assistant (wellness coordinator providing therapeutic technology support)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS: null
"""

system:
Serenity Wellness Sanctuary Sedona (SWSS-23)
Address: 1234 Red Rock Road, Sedona, AZ 86336, USA
Category: Wellness retreat; Holistic healing; Mindfulness technology; Therapeutic services
HDMI cables: 15 units; complimentary; wellness-optimized; mindfulness-compatible; therapeutic quality; setup window 10–15 minutes
Safety: Wellness environment appropriate; therapeutic materials; keep away from meditation areas; gentle installation protocols
Wellness amenities: Meditation gardens; Yoga pavilions; Spa treatments; Holistic therapies; Mindfulness sessions; Nature therapy; Healing crystals; Wellness workshops
Other facts: Breakfast 6:00–9:00; Wellness sessions 7:00–19:00; Meditation 5:00–22:00; Organic dining; Healing gardens; Therapeutic pools; Wellness consultations
Only services listed are available.

user:
Namaste! I need an HDMI cable for my mindfulness and meditation sessions. Do you have wellness-compatible options?

assistant channel=analysis:
The guest is participating in a wellness retreat and needs HDMI cables for mindfulness and meditation sessions. I should explain our wellness-optimized, therapeutic quality options.

assistant channel=final:
Namaste! Our HDMI cables are wellness-optimized and mindfulness-compatible, perfect for your meditation and wellness sessions. They're designed with therapeutic quality to support your healing journey. Setup takes 10-15 minutes with gentle installation protocols.

user:
Beautiful! What meditation sessions are available today?

assistant channel=final:
Today's meditation sessions run from 5:00 to 22:00, including guided meditation, mindfulness sessions, and healing garden walks.

user:
Could you arrange a private consultation with a holistic healing practitioner?

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] Searching for more information.
